html: The heaven - The highest heaven, is the place where I shew myself in my majesty. So Psalm 11:4 , Psalm 103:19 ; Matthew 5:34 . Hence we are taught to pray; our father which art in heaven. And the earth is my footstool - Or a place wherein I set my feet, Matthew 5:35 . The house - Can there be an house built, that will contain me? My rest - Or where is the place wherein I can be said to rest in a proper sense?
